name: test_e2e_with_logs[558_CRLF_HDR_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_HDR_003` |
| **Name** | Redirect Injection via CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | header_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nLocation:http://evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0aLocation%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fevil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~13000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:46:04.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected test_id=CRLF_HDR_003-1772113564428-3vkjxi pattern_id=CRLF_HDR_003 uri=/?q=%0d%0aLocation%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fevil.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
